<Text: Bruce Alan Campbell (born April 22, 1957), credited professionally as Alan Campbell, is an American television, film and stage actor who is best known for his roles as Derek Mitchell in the 1987–1992 CBS series "Jake and the Fatman" and as E.Z. Taylor on the short-lived 1984–1985 "Three's Company" spin-off "Three's a Crowd".>
